name: Path of Exile Name Generator
description: Craft the perfect moniker for your Exile! Tired of generic names? Unleash the power of our generator and forge a legend in Wraeclast!
introduction: Welcome, Exile! Your journey through Wraeclast demands a name worthy of your deeds. Are you a Shadow, a Witch, a Marauder? Let our generator conjure a name that reflects your power and destiny in Path of Exile. Don't be a 'NoobMaster69' – become a legend!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button and behold! A brand new, totally awesome Path of Exile name will appear.
Keep clicking until you find a name that resonates with your inner Exile. Embrace the darkness, the light, or just something that sounds really, really cool.
Feeling creative? Mix and match prefixes and suffixes to create a truly unique and terrifying (or hilarious) name.
Once you've found the perfect name, copy it and unleash it upon the unsuspecting monsters of Wraeclast! Prepare for glory (or at least a few chuckles from your party).
Pro Tip: Try whispering your generated name dramatically in a mirror. If you don't feel a surge of power, generate another one!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually going to make me a better Path of Exile player?
faqs.answer: Probably not. But you'll *look* cooler while you're getting wrecked by Kitava. And that's what really matters, right?

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other games?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While tailored for Path of Exile, these names can be adapted for any fantasy RPG, tabletop game, or even naming your pet hamster (if you're feeling particularly edgy).

faqs.question: Are the generated names lore-friendly?
faqs.answer: We've tried to capture the dark and gritty essence of Wraeclast, but ultimately, it's about having fun! Some names might be more 'lore-adjacent' than others. Think of it as alternate universe naming.

faqs.question: How many names can I generate?
faqs.answer: Generate to your heart's content! There's no limit. Keep those names coming until you find the one that truly speaks to your Exile's soul (or at least sounds vaguely threatening).

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the names?
faqs.answer: Well, that's just unfortunate. But seriously, keep trying! With enough clicks, you're bound to find a gem. Or, you know, just go with 'Bob'. No judgment.

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: Yes! Enjoy the power of name generation without spending a single Chaos Orb. We just want to help you unleash your inner Exile.
